text: Routledge Philosophy Guidebook to Hegel and the Phenomenology of Spirit is a 2002 book by the philosopher Robert Stern, in which the author provides an introduction to The Phenomenology of Spirit by Hegel. ==Reception== Simon Lumsden and Terry Pinkard have reviewed the book. A review of the Persian translation of the book has been published in the PTMBR. == References == == External links == * Full Text of the Book Category:2002 non-fiction books Category:English-language books Category:Books about Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel Category:Routledge books
